name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【おおきにアリーナ舞洲】 [Q1s4w-_ujig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title screen for Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 "Spectra of Nova" at Ookini Arena Maishima, displaying the concert date and a notice that the show will start soon.
Attention slide providing venue guidelines for attendees, including lighting warnings and cheering policies.
Showcase of official concert merchandise, including the Essentials Pack, Light Stick, Towel, and other apparel.
Continuous loop of fan-submitted messages and illustrations displayed on the screen before the performance begins.

subtitles.original:
HOSHIMACHI SUISEI LIVE TOUR 2024
SPECTRA of NOVA
subtitles.english:
HOSHIMACHI SUISEI LIVE TOUR 2024
SPECTRA of NOVA

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: Attention / ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
